creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: red silk square with raised multicolor design of large flower, stems, small flowere and birds; silk borders (green, white and blue) with embroidered floral designs all on black ground with black extensions; yellow metal outlining; lined in black cotton; edged in borwn that crosses 4 1/2 x 5 1/4" square at bottom; 4-6" ties at bottom; metal disks; some pencilled-in designs unfinished
title: Baby Carrier
